Item.Risk_Statement: Insufficient segregation of communications and interfaces between the system processes, may expose sensitive information resources to unauthorized access.
Item.Description: The information system maintains a separate execution domain for each executing process.
Item.Example: The information system automatically enables a separate execution domain.
Item.State_Implementation: The organization uses operating systems that support process isolation.
Item.Testing_Procedures:
Obtain procedures addressing process isolation and ascertain if:
(i) Information systems maintain separate execution domains for each executing process
(ii) Each information system process has a distinct address space to securely control the communications and interfaces between the two processes (such that one process cannot modify the executing code of another process)
